org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: Input_File_Name
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: File to be used as an input to this scenario

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
@echo off if exist buildtime.txt del buildtime.txt
tzutil /s "UTC"
set hour=%time:~0,2% if "%hour:~0,1%" == " " set hour=0%hour:~1,1%
set min=%time:~3,2% if "%min:~0,1%" == " " set min=0%min:~1,1%
set secs=%time:~6,2% if "%secs:~0,1%" == " " set secs=0%secs:~1,1%
echo START_TIME=%date:~6,4%-%date:~3,2%-%date:~0,2%T%hour%:%min%:%secs%.%time:~9,2%Z >> buildtime.txt

@echo off set hour=%time:~0,2% if "%hour:~0,1%" == " " set hour=0%hour:~1,1%
set min=%time:~3,2% if "%min:~0,1%" == " " set min=0%min:~1,1%
set secs=%time:~6,2% if "%secs:~0,1%" == " " set secs=0%secs:~1,1%
set END_TIME=%date:~6,4%-%date:~3,2%-%date:~0,2%T%hour%:%min%:%secs%.%time:~9,2%Z
echo KIBANA_URL="https://search-logs-cup-alpha-ga3wsaogpm2bgvkzkgtrww6cvy.us-west-2.es.amazonaws.com/_plugin/kibana/app/kibana#/discover/AXHqGgMUHa4ewHuvTBiF?_g=(refreshInterval:(display:Off,pause:!f,value:0),time:(from:'%START_TIME%',mode:absolute,to:'%END_TIME%'))&_a=(columns:!(err.message,request_path,ref_id),filters:!(),index:AXGIT8NoHa4ewHuvTBgb,interval:auto,query:(query_string:(analyze_wildcard:!t,query:'%%22error%%22%%20NOT%%20%%22warning%%22')),sort:!('@timestamp',desc))" >> buildtime.txt
tzutil /s "India Standard Time"
